amendment.description: To provide for the conduct of activities that promote the adoption of technologies that reduce greenhouse gas intensity in the United States and in developing countries and to provide credit-based financial assistance and investment protection for projects that employ advanced climate technologies or systems in the United States.

action.text: Amendment SA 817 proposed by Senator Hagel.

vote.text: Amendment SA 817 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 29. Record Vote Number: 144.
